text: Shito yo, tagaini fushinjin ni kisou mono no tame ni anata no kokoro o itamete wa naranai. Kare-ra wa Ro de,`watashi-tachi wa shinkō suru.' To iuga, kokorode wa shinjite wa inai. Mata yudayahito no nakaniha, kyogi o kikidasu koto bakari ni nesshinde, anata no sho ni mattaku yoritsukanai mono ga iru. Kare-ra wa sono kotoba o (tadashī) imi kara yugamete iu. `Moshi kore ga, anata gata ni atae rareta mono (rippō to onajidearu) to omounaraba, ukeire nasai. Daga anata gata ni atae rareta mono to onajidenainaraba, yōjin shi nasai.' Arrā ga ichido kokoromi ni kakeyou to o nozomi no mono ni wa, anata wa kare-ra no tame, arrā ni taishi nani no ken'i mo nai. Korera no mono wa, arrā ga sono kokoro o kiyomeru no o, nozoma renai-sha-tachidearu. Kare-ra wa gense ni oite kutsujoku o uke, raise ni oite mo hidoi chōbatsu o ukerudearou
